meanings.definition: Cetologists: experts who study marine mammals, particularly whales.
meanings.sent1: The cetologists observed the behavior of whales in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent2: Many cetologists work together to protect the ocean's majestic creatures.
meanings.sent3: The cetologists joked that they were 'whale whisperers' due to their deep understanding of these animals.
meanings.sent4: She dove into her research like a cetologist diving into the depths of the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The cetologists' passion for marine life was as vast as the ocean itself.

meanings.definition: Cetologists: the group of scientists dedicated to researching and understanding cetaceans.
meanings.sent1: A team of cetologists set out on a mission to study the migration patterns of dolphins.
meanings.sent2: The cetologists' findings shed light on the communication methods of different whale species.
meanings.sent3: During their break, the cetologists playfully imitated the sounds of whales to entertain each other.
meanings.sent4: The dedication of cetologists is as deep as the ocean they study.
meanings.sent5: The cetologists' research boat rocked gently on the waves as they observed the playful dolphins.

meanings.definition: Cetologists: those who specialize in the field of cetology, the study of whales and dolphins.
meanings.sent1: As a cetologist, she spent hours analyzing the vocalizations of different whale species.
meanings.sent2: The cetologists' conference brought together experts from around the world to share their latest findings.
meanings.sent3: The cetologists' passion for marine life was evident in every conversation they had.
meanings.sent4: The cetologists' knowledge of cetaceans was as vast as the ocean itself.
meanings.sent5: The cetologists' dedication to their research was unwavering, like the tides of the sea.
